p.seg: who was the daughter of the Sovereign of Heaven.
Year in and Year out she toiled away at weaving cloth,
and she finished weaving the cloud-brocade Garment of Heaven.
Her own appearance she had not the time to pay proper attention to.
The Sovereign of Heaven felt sorry for here living all alone
and he allowed her to get married to a buffalo shepherd from East of the Milky Way.
After she got parried she then gave up weaving,
and the Sovereign of Heaven got angry at her.
He gave her an official order to return to Milky Way East,
and he only let them meet once per year.
The laichi plum grows between Xia and the Ba prefecture, and the shape of the tree is all round like a baldachin.

The leaves are like those of the gui-tree and evergreen. The flowers are like those of the orange tree, blossoming in the spring. The fruits are like cinnamon, ripening in the summer. The blossoms are like the wine-plant, and the kernels are like the
pípá fruit. The shell is like red silk, the membrane skin is like red raw silk, the fuitmeat is pure white like ice and snow, the juice is sweet and sour

like sweet wine, and like sweet and sour rice sauce. By and large it is like that, but in reality it is more than that. Once it leaves the twig on which it is hanging, then on the first day its colour will change.
